import React from 'react'; import choco from './Choco.json'; import './Home.css'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; function Home(props) { const navigate = useNavigate(); const addToCartBtn = (index) => { let product = Data[index]; props.purchaseItems(product); alert(product.name + 'items has been added to Cart.'); if(window.confirm('Proceed to MyCart???')) navigate('./MyCart') } return ( <>

Best Seller

    • {/*
    • */}
{choco.map((choco, index) => { return ( <>

{choco.name}

{choco.price}


Quantity:
Detail Add to Cart
) })}
); } export default Home;
